permissions: Allowed for admins or users who have update permission on the certifies record (per the certifies policy).
side_effects: Updates certification attributes and may reschedule expiration handling; if expires_at is in the past, the certification may be set to expired immediately.
validation_notes: At least one of --effective-at, --expires-at, or --status must be provided. effective_at must be before expires_at when both are set. expires_at is required when the certification type requires expiration. status must be one of: editing, submitted, approved, declined, expired, archived.

flags.name: --expires-at
flags.validation: YYYY-MM-DD date format; required when certification type requires expiration.

flags.name: --status
flags.validation: One of: editing, submitted, approved, declined, expired, archived.
